cast.overview: Everyone deserves a great love story, but for 17-year-old Simon Spier, it's a little more complicated. He hasn't told his family or friends that he's gay, and he doesn't know the identity of the anonymous classmate that he's fallen for online.
cast.title: Love, Simon

cast.overview: The powerful true story of Harvard-educated lawyer Bryan Stevenson, who goes to Alabama to defend the disenfranchised and wrongly condemned — including Walter McMillian, a man sentenced to death despite evidence proving his innocence. Bryan fights tirelessly for Walter with the system stacked against them.
cast.title: Just Mercy

details.biography:
American actor/model Josh Royston began as a fashion model doing runway, print, magazines and various advertisements. His first cover was for a gun magazine called "World of Firepower". Since that time, he has gone on to grace other magazine covers, advertisements and commercials, as well as semi-recurring background roles on shows such as The Resident, Dynasty, Star and others. He has also had minor roles in films like First Man, The Frontrunner, American Animals and Pitch Perfect III.

He was born Joshua William Royston on October 22, 1976, in Greenwood, SC. He is the son of Leesa (Inabinet), a judge, and Tim Royston, a retired business owner. Josh was the oldest of three children. His ancestry is French Huguenot. He resides in Greenville, SC.

Josh has one daughter, Ava Grace Royston who is 8.
details.name: Josh Royston
